mapper.insert: insert into trash ( company, tName, tExp, tCateEGram1, tCateEGram2, tCateEGram3, tCateEGram4, tCateEGram5, tCateEGram6, tCateEGram7, tCateNGram1, tCateNGram2, tCateNGram3, tCateNGram4, tCateNGram5, tScore ) values ( #{company}, #{tName}, #{tExp}, ${tCateEGram1}, ${tCateEGram2}, ${tCateEGram3}, ${tCateEGram4}, ${tCateEGram5}, ${tCateEGram6}, ${tCateEGram7}, ${tCateNGram1}, ${tCateNGram2}, ${tCateNGram3}, ${tCateNGram4}, ${tCateNGram5}, ${tScore} )
